infocenter_data.iar_description: The USB DUALCDC Project will help you to get familiar with the USB Device Port(UDP)interface and also some of the other interfaces in SAM9 microcontrollers. Also it can help you to be familiar with the USB Framework that is used for rapid development of USB-compliant class drivers such as USB Communication Device class (CDC), and how to combine two USB functions to a single composite device (such as Dual CDC port).
